name: coincident
description: An Atomics based Proxy to simplify, and synchronize, Worker related tasks

scripts.build: node build/index.cjs && node build/constants.cjs && rollup --config build/dist.js && sabayon ./test/sw.js && npm run size
scripts.size: echo -e "\x1b[1mfile          size\x1b[0m";echo "server/main   $(cat dist/server/main.js | brotli | wc -c)";echo "server/worker $(cat dist/server/worker.js | brotli | wc -c)";echo "window/main   $(cat dist/window/main.js | brotli | wc -c)";echo "window/worker $(cat dist/window/worker.js | brotli | wc -c)";echo "main          $(cat dist/main.js | brotli | wc -c)";echo "worker        $(cat dist/worker.js | brotli | wc -c)"

author: Andrea Giammarchi
